title: Storms
description: I once thought I might kill a prince. In another glance, I thought I would marry him. But then came a day I never expected.The day I would kill a god.When Arianna freed the soul of the prince from a dark god and shattered the underworld, she assumed she could bring peace to the world above. But there are consequences to the powers she gained and a war brewing between the provinces that will require all her magic and heart.To master her gifts and save her home, Ari climbs to the top of Olympus and fights a war with gods on either side.
author: Jacque Stevens
